summary: Comprehensive e2e testing completed for Mallow natural skincare e-commerce website. All core functionality working perfectly.

design_issues.issue: Some product images show as placeholder boxes instead of actual product images
design_issues.note: Images load properly on product detail pages, functionality not affected

passed_tests: All backend APIs (100% success rate - 13/13 tests passed)
Products API - all 3 products load correctly
Cart CRUD operations - create, add, update, remove items
Stripe checkout integration - creates proper payment sessions
Shop page navigation and product display
Product detail pages with add to cart functionality
Cart page with quantity controls and checkout button
Cart badge updates when items added
